# useTooltipBase

Returns a tuple with two functions to show and hide a tooltip.

## Returns

`useTooltipBase~Return` - tuple with show and hide functions.

## Example

```js
import {useCallback, useRef} from 'react';
import {useTooltipBase} from '@bluecateng/pelagos';

const Example = () => {
	const [show, hide] = useTooltipBase();
	const ref = useRef(null);
	const handleClick = useCallback(() => show('Example tooltip', 'top', ref.current), [show]);
	return (
		<div ref={ref}>
			<button onClick={handleClick}>Show</button>
			<button onClick={hide}>Hide</button>
		</div>
	);
};
```

## Other types

### useTooltipBase~Return

`Array` - return type for `useTooltipBase`.

#### Properties

| Name | Type       | Description               |
| ---- | ---------- | ------------------------- |
| 0    | `function` | function to show tooltip. |
| 1    | `function` | function to hide tooltip. |
